DellInfiniBandCapabilities.description: An instance of DellInfiniBandCapabilities will have data specific to InfiniBand and its port and partitions capabilities.
DellInfiniBandCapabilities.longDescription: An instance of DellInfiniBandCapabilities will have data specific to InfiniBand and its port and partitions capabilities.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

BPESupport.description: This property represents Bridge Port Extension (BPE) for the ports of the InfiniBand.
BPESupport.longDescription: This property represents Bridge Port Extension (BPE) for the ports of the InfiniBand.

CongestionNotification.description: This property represents congestion notification support for a InfiniBand port.
CongestionNotification.longDescription: This property represents congestion notification support for a InfiniBand port.

DCBExchangeProtocol.description: This property represents DCB Exchange protocol support for a InfiniBand port.
DCBExchangeProtocol.longDescription: This property represents DCB Exchange protocol support for a InfiniBand port.

ETS.description: This property represents Enhanced Transmission Selection support for a InfiniBand port.
ETS.longDescription: This property represents Enhanced Transmission Selection support for a InfiniBand port.

EVBModesSupport.description: This property represents EVB Edge Virtual Bridging) mode support for the ports of the InfiniBand. Possible values are 0 Unknown, 2 Supported, 3 Not Supported.
EVBModesSupport.longDescription: This property represents EVB Edge Virtual Bridging) mode support for the ports of the InfiniBand. Possible values are 0 Unknown, 2 Supported, 3 Not Supported.

EnergyEfficientEthernet.description: This property represents energy-efficient ethernet support for a InfiniBand port.
EnergyEfficientEthernet.longDescription: This property represents energy-efficient ethernet support for a InfiniBand port.

FeatureLicensingSupport.description: This property represents feature licensing support for the InfiniBand.
FeatureLicensingSupport.longDescription: This property represents feature licensing support for the InfiniBand.

FlexAddressingSupport.description: This property represents flex-addressing support for a InfiniBand port.
FlexAddressingSupport.longDescription: This property represents flex-addressing support for a InfiniBand port.

IPSecOffloadSupport.description: This property represents IPSec offload support for a InfiniBand port.
IPSecOffloadSupport.longDescription: This property represents IPSec offload support for a InfiniBand port.

LinkSupportedSpeed.description: This property specifies the supported link speed of InfiniBand port.
LinkSupportedSpeed.longDescription: This property specifies the supported link speed of InfiniBand port.

LinkSupportedWidth.description: This property specifies the supported link width of InfiniBand port.
LinkSupportedWidth.longDescription: This property specifies the supported link width of InfiniBand port.

MACSecSupport.description: This property represents secure MAC support for a InfiniBand port.
MACSecSupport.longDescription: This property represents secure MAC support for a InfiniBand port.

NWManagementPassThrough.description: This property represents network management passthrough support for a InfiniBand port.
NWManagementPassThrough.longDescription: This property represents network management passthrough support for a InfiniBand port.

NicPartitioningSupport.description: This property represents partitioning support for the InfiniBand.
NicPartitioningSupport.longDescription: This property represents partitioning support for the InfiniBand.

OSBMCManagementPassThrough.description: This property represents OS-inband to BMC-out-of-band management passthrough support for a InfiniBand port.
OSBMCManagementPassThrough.longDescription: This property represents OS-inband to BMC-out-of-band management passthrough support for a InfiniBand port.

Oem.longDescription: This property shall contain the OEM extensions.  All values for properties that this object contains shall conform to the Redfish Specification-described requirements.

OnChipThermalSensor.description: This property represents on-chip thermal sensor support for the InfiniBand.
OnChipThermalSensor.longDescription: This property represents on-chip thermal sensor support for the InfiniBand.

OpenFlowSupport.description: This property represents open-flow support for a InfiniBand port.
OpenFlowSupport.longDescription: This property represents open-flow support for a InfiniBand port.

PXEBootSupport.description: This property represents PXE-boot support for a InfiniBand port.
PXEBootSupport.longDescription: This property represents PXE-boot support for a InfiniBand port.

PartitionWOLSupport.description: This property represents Wake-On-LAN support for a InfiniBand partition.
PartitionWOLSupport.longDescription: This property represents Wake-On-LAN support for a InfiniBand partition.

PersistencePolicySupport.description: This property specifies whether the card supports persistence policy.
PersistencePolicySupport.longDescription: This property specifies whether the card supports persistence policy.

PriorityFlowControl.description: This property represents priority flow-control support for a InfiniBand port.
PriorityFlowControl.longDescription: This property represents priority flow-control support for a InfiniBand port.

RDMASupport.description: This property represents RDMA support for a InfiniBand port.
RDMASupport.longDescription: This property represents RDMA support for a InfiniBand port.

RXFlowControl.description: This property represents RX flow-control support for a InfiniBand port.
RXFlowControl.longDescription: This property represents RX flow-control support for a InfiniBand port.

RemotePHY.description: This property represents remote PHY support for a InfiniBand port.
RemotePHY.longDescription: This property represents remote PHY support for a InfiniBand port.

TCPChimneySupport.description: This property represents TCP Chimney support for a InfiniBand port.
TCPChimneySupport.longDescription: This property represents TCP Chimney support for a InfiniBand port.

TXBandwidthControlMaximum.description: This property represents open-flow support for a InfiniBand port.
TXBandwidthControlMaximum.longDescription: This property represents open-flow support for a InfiniBand port.

TXBandwidthControlMinimum.description: This property represents open-flow support for a InfiniBand port.
TXBandwidthControlMinimum.longDescription: This property represents open-flow support for a InfiniBand port.

TXFlowControl.description: This property represents TX flow-control support for a InfiniBand partition.
TXFlowControl.longDescription: This property represents TX flow-control support for a InfiniBand partition.

VEB.description: This property provides details about the VEB (Virtual Ethernet Bridging) - single channel support for the ports of the InfiniBand.
VEB.longDescription: This property provides details about the VEB (Virtual Ethernet Bridging) - single channel support for the ports of the InfiniBand.

VEBVEPAMultiChannel.description: This property provides details about the VEB-VEPA (Virtual Ethernet Bridging and Virtual Ethernet Port Aggregator) multichannel support for the ports of the InfiniBand.
VEBVEPAMultiChannel.longDescription: This property provides details about the VEB-VEPA (Virtual Ethernet Bridging and Virtual Ethernet Port Aggregator) multichannel support for the ports of the InfiniBand.

VEBVEPASingleChannel.description: This property provides details about the VEB-VEPA (Virtual Ethernet Bridging and Virtual Ethernet Port Aggregator) - single channel support for the ports of the InfiniBand.
VEBVEPASingleChannel.longDescription: This property provides details about the VEB-VEPA (Virtual Ethernet Bridging and Virtual Ethernet Port Aggregator) - single channel support for the ports of the InfiniBand.

VFSRIOVSupport.description: This property represents support for Virtual Function of Single Root I/O Virtualization for a InfiniBand port.
VFSRIOVSupport.longDescription: This property represents support for Virtual Function of Single Root I/O Virtualization for a InfiniBand port.

VirtualLinkControl.description: This property represents virtual link-control support for a InfiniBand partition.
VirtualLinkControl.longDescription: This property represents virtual link-control support for a InfiniBand partition.

WOLSupport.description: This property represents Wake-On-LAN support for a InfiniBand port.
WOLSupport.longDescription: This property represents Wake-On-LAN support for a InfiniBand port.

iSCSIBootSupport.description: This property represents iSCSI boot support for a InfiniBand port.
iSCSIBootSupport.longDescription: This property represents iSCSI boot support for a InfiniBand port.

iSCSIOffloadSupport.description: This property represents iSCSI offload support for a InfiniBand port.
iSCSIOffloadSupport.longDescription: This property represents iSCSI offload support for a InfiniBand port.

uEFISupport.description: This property represents UEFI support for a InfiniBand port.
uEFISupport.longDescription: This property represents UEFI support for a InfiniBand port.

title: #DellInfiniBandCapabilities.v1_0_0.DellInfiniBandCapabilities
